name: Defend The King (Şükrü)
description:
Defend The King is a 2d isometric strategy game which have different enemy and soldier types with different skills. You can test your strategic abilities in the battlefield against the unending goblin hordes. 

I share videos about my projects on my YouTube channel. If you like my game and want to be informed about my upcoming projects first hand, you can follow me on YouTube:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCi-Q9KUPLn_wVKx0lakukcg
